title: I say GG EZ every win
body:
Every game I say gg ez because every game is easy for me. All of the other players in bronze 4 are terrible and I deserve challenger, riot please stop putting me with these ELO boosted scrubs and ban all the feeders when I lose.

gg ez

replies.body: Itz playaz liek u that ruen the integriti of the gaem wow reported

Learn to troll please,

1/10 no effort.
Oh and zilean top is beast, raped a Jax and made him cri for mercy with my time bombs.
I went 8/1 against a Yasuo with Zilean top

Key words; Yasuo and Top. 

Yasuo gets countered by everything top. He is really bad there.
Key words 2.0: Not sure if you noticed, but Zilean. Zilean. ZILEAN. Wait, I was using the groovy skin so *shrug*
Yeah but Zilean is very strong when full AP. You just waste his passive in top though and he is better as a support.

Here are some rules to playing Zilean:
1. You ALWAYS ult the carry. No matter what.
2. You ARE the carry. In any composition.
Trust me, I know how to play Zilean
Pls ignore dis 12vy kid. Obviously a troll.
